verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, an \w apostle|strong="G0652"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* the \w will|strong="G2307"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w* \add our\add* \w brother|strong="G0080"\w*,

To the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* which are \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Colosse|strong="G2857"\w*: \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

We give \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* to \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* of \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w praying|strong="G4336"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w* \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*,

Since we \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* of the \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \add which ye have\add* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*,

\w For|strong="G1223"\w* the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* which is laid \w up|strong="G0606"\w* for \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w whereof|strong="G3739"\w* ye heard \w before|strong="G4257"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of the \w truth|strong="G0225"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*;

Which is \w come|strong="G3918"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \add it is\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w world|strong="G2889"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* bringeth forth \w fruit|strong="G2592"\w*, \w as|strong="G2531"\w* \add it doth\add* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w since|strong="G0575"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* ye \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add of it\add*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w knew|strong="G1921"\w* the \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*:

\w As|strong="G2531"\w* \w ye|strong="G3129"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w learned|strong="G3129"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w Epaphras|strong="G1889"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w dear|strong="G0027"\w* \w fellowservant|strong="G4889"\w*, \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* a \w faithful|strong="G4103"\w* \w minister|strong="G1249"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3588"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w declared|strong="G1213"\w* unto \w us|strong="G2254"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1223"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w cause|strong="G1223"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w*, \w since|strong="G0575"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* we \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add it\add*, \w do|strong="G3973"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w cease|strong="G3973"\w* to \w pray|strong="G4336"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w desire|strong="G0154"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye might be filled \w with|strong="G4137"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w will|strong="G2307"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w spiritual|strong="G4152"\w* \w understanding|strong="G4907"\w*;

\w That|strong="G4043"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* might \w walk|strong="G4043"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0516"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w pleasing|strong="G0699"\w*, being \w fruitful|strong="G2592"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w increasing|strong="G0837"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

\w Strengthened|strong="G1412"\w* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w might|strong="G1411"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w glorious|strong="G1391"\w* \w power|strong="G2904"\w*, \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w patience|strong="G5281"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w longsuffering|strong="G3115"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w joyfulness|strong="G5479"\w*;

Giving \w thanks|strong="G2168"\w* unto the \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, which hath \w made|strong="G2427"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w meet|strong="G2427"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* be \w partakers|strong="G3310"\w* of the \w inheritance|strong="G2819"\w* of the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w light|strong="G5457"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* hath \w delivered|strong="G4506"\w* \w us|strong="G2248"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w power|strong="G1849"\w* of \w darkness|strong="G4655"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* hath \w translated|strong="G3179"\w* \add us\add* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* the \w kingdom|strong="G0932"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w dear|strong="G0026"\w* \w Son|strong="G5207"\w*:

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* we \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w redemption|strong="G0629"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w blood|strong="G0129"\w*, \add even\add* the \w forgiveness|strong="G0859"\w* of \w sins|strong="G0266"\w*:

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w image|strong="G1504"\w* of the \w invisible|strong="G0517"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, the \w firstborn|strong="G4416"\w* of \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w creature|strong="G2937"\w*:

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w were|strong="G2936"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w created|strong="G2936"\w*, that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* that \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w visible|strong="G3707"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w invisible|strong="G0517"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \add they be\add* \w thrones|strong="G2362"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w dominions|strong="G2963"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w principalities|strong="G0746"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w powers|strong="G1849"\w*: all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* were \w created|strong="G2936"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*:

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w before|strong="G4253"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w consist|strong="G4921"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w head|strong="G2776"\w* of the \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*: \w who|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w beginning|strong="G0746"\w*, the \w firstborn|strong="G4416"\w* \w from|strong="G1537"\w* the \w dead|strong="G3498"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \add things\add* \w he|strong="G0846"\w* \w might|strong="G1096"\w* have the \w preeminence|strong="G4409"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* it \w pleased|strong="G2106"\w* \add the Father\add* that \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w should|strong="G2730"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w fulness|strong="G4138"\w* \w dwell|strong="G2730"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w*, having made \w peace|strong="G1517"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* the \w blood|strong="G0129"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w cross|strong="G4716"\w*, \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* to \w reconcile|strong="G0604"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* \w himself|strong="G0846"\w*; \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \add I say\add*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \add they be\add* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1909"\w* \w earth|strong="G1093"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, that \w were|strong="G5607"\w* \w sometime|strong="G4218"\w* \w alienated|strong="G0526"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w enemies|strong="G2190"\w* \w in|strong="G1271"\w* \add your\add* \w mind|strong="G1271"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w wicked|strong="G4190"\w* \w works|strong="G2041"\w*, \w yet|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* hath he \w reconciled|strong="G0604"\w*

\w In|strong="G1722"\w* the \w body|strong="G4983"\w* of \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*, to \w present|strong="G3936"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w holy|strong="G0040"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unblameable|strong="G0299"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w unreproveable|strong="G0410"\w* \w in|strong="G2714"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sight|strong="G2714"\w*:

\w If|strong="G1489"\w* ye continue \w in|strong="G1961"\w* the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w grounded|strong="G2311"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w settled|strong="G1476"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add be\add* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* moved \w away|strong="G3334"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* ye have \w heard|strong="G0191"\w*, \add and\add* which was \w preached|strong="G2784"\w* \w to|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w creature|strong="G2937"\w* which is \w under|strong="G5259"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*; \w whereof|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* am \w made|strong="G1096"\w* a \w minister|strong="G1249"\w*;

\w Who|strong="G3739"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w sufferings|strong="G3804"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* fill \w up|strong="G0466"\w* that which is \w behind|strong="G5303"\w* of the \w afflictions|strong="G2347"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w bodyâ€™s|strong="G4983"\w* \w sake|strong="G5228"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* the \w church|strong="G1577"\w*:

\w Whereof|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* am \w made|strong="G1096"\w* a \w minister|strong="G1249"\w*, according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* the \w dispensation|strong="G3622"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w* which is \w given|strong="G1325"\w* to \w me|strong="G3427"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, to \w fulfil|strong="G4137"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*;

\add Even\add* the \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* which hath been \w hid|strong="G0613"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w ages|strong="G0165"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w generations|strong="G1074"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w now|strong="G3570"\w* is made \w manifest|strong="G5319"\w* \w to|strong="G0040"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w saints|strong="G0040"\w*:

To \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w would|strong="G2309"\w* make \w known|strong="G1107"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \add is\add* the \w riches|strong="G4149"\w* of the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* of \w this|strong="G5127"\w* \w mystery|strong="G3466"\w* \w among|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Gentiles|strong="G1484"\w*; \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, the \w hope|strong="G1680"\w* of \w glory|strong="G1391"\w*:

\w Whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w we|strong="G2249"\w* \w preach|strong="G2605"\w*, \w warning|strong="G3560"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w teaching|strong="G1321"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w wisdom|strong="G4678"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* we may \w present|strong="G3936"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w man|strong="G0444"\w* \w perfect|strong="G5046"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*:

\w Whereunto|strong="G1519"\w* \w I|strong="G2872"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w labour|strong="G2872"\w*, \w striving|strong="G0075"\w* according \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w working|strong="G1753"\w*, which \w worketh|strong="G1754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w mightily|strong="G1411"\w*.
